data.title: Racing at its Best
data.meta_description: SpeedQuest on Frederick is KWâs latest indoor attraction dedicated to the racing enthusiasts. It is an ideal location for racers and pure adrenaline lovers. With a track designed for maximum straight line speeds and overlooking views. It is a breath of fresh air for the KW area and perfect for get-togethers, adult and kidsâ birthday parties, corporate events, team building exercises, and so much more. We offer so many great packages and invite you to join us at our Frederick Mall indoor go karting location to see things for yourself.
data.text:
Q2: What is the top speed of the karts?

A2: The karts have a maximum speed of 40kph.

Q5: How many people can race at a time?

A5: 4 people are allowed on track at a time

SPEEDQUEST

ADULT BIRTHDAY PARTY PACKAGE

All-in-One Birthday Experience

Adults can have us host great birthdays. Our all-in-one birthday experience is second to none we've got food, drinks, and atmosphere locked down - all you need to bring is your friends. At SpeedQuest, we know that planning adult birthday parties can be difficult to plan, but a go-kart party at our location is guaranteed to excite all in your group. Our electric karts are easy to drive but carry a far higher speed than similar karts. They are not only quieter but smoother with Superb acceleration and a beautiful chasis.

The Terrific performance of our electric karts are for you and your entourage. We have a variety of packages to meet your needs and satisfy all your party needs. Our authentic racing experience is unique and is sure to be the perfect way to spend your day with friends and loved ones. Have a Go Kart Party â¦.. Happy YOU Day

Waivers

All racers need to sign a waiver prior to having access to our karts. You may fill the online form or print out, fill and hand it in.

Simply click the link to download or fill online.

Register
